name: Twinsync
description:
The Game

Trapped in a dungeon, a mage and an archer must use the power of teamwork to escape by fighting off waves of enemies and ultimately beating the Skeleton king!.

A twin-stick shooter rogue-lite, Twinsync is a game about managing 2 characters at once and utilising a powerful team link that binds them in order to overcome evil. Collect items at various points in the game, ranging from stat potions and new projectiles to vials of power and an aura boost that strengthens the very bond between your team!

How to play

General Controls:

- 'WASD' for movement.

- 'Arrow Keys' for shooting.

- 'Spacebar' to switch characters.

- 'E' to pick up items when over them.
